backend/main.mo: Defines core canister types for salons, bookings, images, user profiles, and seeds initial Swiss salons while integrating authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing required frontend overwrite and minimal-fix compilation steps, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend components and pages describing their roles in the UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config with OKLCH color variables and theme overrides for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML scaffold mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Mounts and exports AppV1 as the root component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Implements the V24 OMEGA SINGULARITY UI with sample data, animated core navigation, and multiple interaction components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor instances with auto‑refresh and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, authentication flow, local identity persistence, and provider setup utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, global base styles, scrollbar hiding, and multiple animation keyframes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty placeholder file for the client dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the login page.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the professional dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the salon details page.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility file intended for currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system based on CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s evolving architecture, resets, UX direction, backend model, and known issues across versions.
